channel.title: DevOps on Rukshan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on Rukshan's Blog

item.title: Running a Local HAPI FHIR Server For Testing HL7 FHIR Requests
item.description: When implementing FHIR, a FHIR server is essential for validating and process incoming FHIR requests from clients. Also, it will be the place where you store your customized profiles, valuesets, and codesystems that is necessary for managing terminology.
